TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Assets extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Static class for accessing assets on the current platform.
Gets or sets the app name to be used when storing user data.
Gets or sets the organization name to be used when storing user data.

MemberSignature.Value: public static float PixelScale { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the current pixel scaling value (e.g., 2f for retina).

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Stream ResolveAddonStream (string path, System.IO.FileMode mode = System.IO.FileMode.Open, System.IO.FileAccess access = System.IO.FileAccess.Read);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Stream ResolveAddonStream(string path, valuetype System.IO.FileMode mode, valuetype System.IO.FileAccess access) cil managed

Docs.summary: Resolves an add-on path into a stream for reading.
Docs.remarks: Only applicable on platforms with in-app add-on support.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Stream ResolveStream(string path) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the asset relative to the base asset path.
Docs.summary: Resolves a named asset into a stream for reading.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string ResolveUserPath(string path) cil managed

Docs.param: A relative path inside the user data folder, or an empty string to return the user data root.
Docs.summary: Gets the user data folder or a path to a sub-folder inside the user data folder.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Stream ResolveUserStream (string path, System.IO.FileMode mode = System.IO.FileMode.Open, System.IO.FileAccess access = System.IO.FileAccess.ReadWrite);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Stream ResolveUserStream(string path, valuetype System.IO.FileMode mode, valuetype System.IO.FileAccess access) cil managed

Docs.param: Relative path to user data file.
Docs.summary: Resolves a user data file by relative path.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetAppInfo (string appName, string orgName = "");
.method public static hidebysig void SetAppInfo(string appName, string orgName) cil managed

Docs.param: The app name to use when storing user data.
The organization name to use when storing user data.
Docs.summary: Sets the app and org names for the currently running app.
Docs.remarks: Only applicable on platforms with persistent settings APIs.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetKey (string key, string iv);
.method public static hidebysig void SetKey(string key, string iv) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the encryption key and IV to be used with encrypted assets.
Docs.remarks: Must be called before loading any encrypted assets.
